name: SCAR X
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/az3FyPExJCBsKPvc8

In a dystopian future, a lone-gunslinger must use his cybernetic enhancements to fulfil his destiny as SCAR X, a noble line of protectors within the cyber city of Avant Garden. These warriors act as antibodies in a much larger organism which is the city itself. Raiders from the outside wastelands have sought out to seek the city’s secrets and use it for greed and power. As the guardian, failure will only mean the end of your purpose. Defeat your foe and let none survive to tell the tale for the sake of Avant Garden. Your blaster is your only friend.
